data.name: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations
data.detailed_description:
The year is 1993.
A breakaway faction of nations within the UN has dedicated resources to creating a new, special, intelligence and sabotage task force entrusted with unveiling corrupt secrets of powerful nations and their intentions to the world. Move through the dark and bring their actions into the light.

-Light & Shadow-
Use the shadows as a weapon. Stalk your enemies from the darkness, strike and retreat into the veil. Shoot out lights and disable generators, or blind pursuers with flashbangs and stun lights.

-Silence & Sound-
The environment is alive with sound. Use ambient audio to mask your movements or create a distraction by throwing objects near enemies. But be careful where you step, what surface you move on will make more or less sound depending on the material. Slink through snow or grass, while avoiding brken glass and metal grates. Your enemy is always listening.

-Truth & Lies-
Play through a linear, story-driven campaign set after the collapse of the Soviet Union and the rise of foreign intervention, private military companies, and nation-backed militant groups. Uncover the corrupt intentions of major powers and their ploys.

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/KnightDivGames
Join the Discord Community: https://discord.gg/wa6s4YQfju

data.short_description: A single player story-driven, third person, tactical stealth action game set in the early 1990's. Use the shadows as a weapon, shoot out lights, blind enemies, and strike from the darkness.
